SELECT L.LEV_NO, L.EMP_ID, E.EMP_NAME, C_DEPT.CMN_DETAIL_NAME AS DEPT_NAME, C_TYPE.CMN_DETAIL_NAME AS LEV_TYPE_NAME, L.LEV_START_DATE, L.LEV_END_DATE, L.LEV_DAYS, L.LEV_LEFT_DAYS, L.LEV_REASON, L.LEV_REQ_DATE, L.LEV_APPROVAL_STATUS, L.LEV_APPROVER, L.LEV_APPROVAL_DATE, L.LEV_REMARKS FROM LEAVES L JOIN EMPLOYEES E ON L.EMP_ID = E.EMP_ID
JOIN COMMONCODE_DETAIL C_TYPE ON L.LEV_TYPE = C_TYPE.CMN_DETAIL_CODE
JOIN COMMONCODE_DETAIL C_DEPT ON TO_CHAR(E.DEPT_NO) = C_DEPT.CMN_DETAIL_CODE
ORDER BY L.LEV_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LEAVES( EMP_ID, LEV_TYPE, LEV_START_DATE, LEV_END_TYPE, LEV_DAYS, LEV_LEFT_DAYS, LEV_REASON, LEV_REQ_DATE, LEV_APPROVAL_STATUS, LEV_APPROVER, LEV_APPROVAL_DATE, LEV_REMARKS ) VALUES( #{emp.empId}, #{dto.levType}, #{dto.levStartDate}, #{dto.levEndDate}, #{dto.levDays}, #{dto.levLeftDays}, #{dto.levReason}, now(), #{dto.levApprovalStatus}, #{dto.levApprover}, #{dto.levApprovalDate}, #{dto.levRemarks} )
